content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Now, about the rental price. I'm sure you understand that I am looking to get the best possible price for my property. Why don't you make me an offer and we can take it from there?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want the best price for your property. Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and newly built, I think a price of 500 Euros per month would be fair.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must admit, I was expecting a higher amount. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to negotiate, but I think 500 Euros is too low. Why don't you reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Considering the location and facilities, I will reconsider my offer. Given the apartment's unfurnished condition and lack of appliances, 550 Euros per month seems more reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for considering my point of view. However, I still think 550 Euros is too low. This apartment is brand new, and its location is unbeatable. I think 600 Euros would be more appropriate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your viewpoint. However, the unfurnished condition and lack of appliances make it less desirable for potential tenants. Moreover, the market price for similar apartments in the city is around 580 Euros. Therefore, I propose 580 Euros per month as a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your knowledge of the local market, but I am not willing to accept 580 Euros. This apartment is unique and has a lot to offer. I am willing to go as low as 590 Euros, but I would like to remind you that this is a final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. Given your final offer, I accept the price of 590 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [590] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your business, Mr. Wang. I'm sure you'll be happy in the apartment. If there's anything else I can help you with, please let me know.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your help. Let's proceed with the lease agreement as discussed. If there are no further issues, we can terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
